entries.name: def_post_proc(base_method, extend_method)
entries.desc: Extends the given base_method with a postfix call to the given extend_method.

entries.name: def_pre_proc(base_method, extend_method)
entries.desc: Extends the given base_method with a prefix call to the given extend_method.

entries.name: new_alias_name(name, prefix = "__alias_of__", postfix = "__")
entries.desc: Returns a unique method name to use as an alias for the given name.
